title: Israel anticipates direct attack from Iran; U.S. deploys more vessels to region
content: A U.S. Navy submarine and several destroyers have been sent as concerns grow in the region about a potential Iranian attack on Israel.
summary: A U.S. Navy submarine and several destroyers have been sent as concerns grow in the region about a potential Iranian attack on Israel.

title: Mapping Ukraine’s incursion in Russia
content: Tracking Ukraine’s advance inside Russia with maps.
summary: Tracking Ukraine’s advance inside Russia with maps.

title: Russians evacuated from Kursk as Putin grapples with Ukrainian incursion
content: The acting governor of the Kursk region said the situation is “complicated,” with Ukraine’s forces now in control of more than two dozen Russian villages.
summary: The acting governor of the Kursk region said the situation is “complicated,” with Ukraine’s forces now in control of more than two dozen Russian villages.

title: Fearing war, unsettled at home, Iran weighs retaliation against Israel
content: Iran seeks to project a show of force while avoiding a regional war, a task that has become more difficult after its first direct attack on Israel, which occurred in April.
summary: Iran seeks to project a show of force while avoiding a regional war, a task that has become more difficult after its first direct attack on Israel, which occurred in April.

title: After far-right riots, Brits of color contemplate their safety
content: Large counterprotests have pushed back on anti-immigrant riots. But for people of color and immigrant groups, the riots exposed a worrying undercurrent.
summary: Large counterprotests have pushed back on anti-immigrant riots. But for people of color and immigrant groups, the riots exposed a worrying undercurrent.

title: ‘Exceptionally dangerous’ wildfire with 80-foot flames rages around Athens
content: Greek authorities ordered mass evacuations in more than a dozen areas, spanning several Athens suburbs, as the fire spread out of control.
summary: Greek authorities ordered mass evacuations in more than a dozen areas, spanning several Athens suburbs, as the fire spread out of control.

title: How Coca-Cola tried and failed to suppress a boycott over Gaza
content: An ad campaign in South Asia tried to distance Coca-Cola from Israel. Instead, it became a case study in misguided corporate messaging.
summary: An ad campaign in South Asia tried to distance Coca-Cola from Israel. Instead, it became a case study in misguided corporate messaging.

title: Helicopter crashes into Hilton hotel, kills pilot in ‘unauthorized’ flight
content: Police in Cairns, in Queensland, Australia, said the flight was “unauthorized” and are investigating. Two guests at the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel were injured.
summary: Police in Cairns, in Queensland, Australia, said the flight was “unauthorized” and are investigating. Two guests at the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel were injured.

title: The rescue worker and the opera star: Love and fear in wartime Ukraine
content: He digs for survivors in the rubble of Russian air strikes, she sings on the basement stage of Kharkiv’s opera house. Together, they work to keep their city alive.
summary: He digs for survivors in the rubble of Russian air strikes, she sings on the basement stage of Kharkiv’s opera house. Together, they work to keep their city alive.

title: Israeli leaders keep saying the quiet part out loud
content: Israel is frequently shielded from censure on the global stage by Western powers whose arguments defending Israel get undercut by Israeli officials themselves.
summary: Israel is frequently shielded from censure on the global stage by Western powers whose arguments defending Israel get undercut by Israeli officials themselves.

title: Can’t borrow Eiffel Tower, but L.A. 2028 Olympics can learn from Paris 2024
content: L.A. says it knows how to put on a show. But officials were in Paris to watch how the Summer Games played out.
summary: L.A. says it knows how to put on a show. But officials were in Paris to watch how the Summer Games played out.

title: The risky bets of the Paris Olympics paid off. Who can claim the win?
content: Well before the Closing Ceremonies at the Stade de France on Sunday, the chorus of critics had hushed.
summary: Well before the Closing Ceremonies at the Stade de France on Sunday, the chorus of critics had hushed.

title: What to know about Hezbollah weapons as Israel awaits retaliatory strikes
content: The Lebanese militant group has guided and unguided rockets, antitank artillery, and ballistic and anti-ship missiles, as well as drones equipped with explosives.
summary: The Lebanese militant group has guided and unguided rockets, antitank artillery, and ballistic and anti-ship missiles, as well as drones equipped with explosives.

title: Hezbollah is undeterred as Lebanon braces for war with Israel
content: The militant group has been buoyed by its status as Lebanon’s unrivaled military force, its vast arsenal of weapons and its tens of thousands of men under arms.
summary: The militant group has been buoyed by its status as Lebanon’s unrivaled military force, its vast arsenal of weapons and its tens of thousands of men under arms.

title: Cartel boss ‘El Mayo’: I was detained before meeting with politician
content: The Sinaloa cartel chief said El Chapo Guzmán’s son invited him to a meeting with Sinaloa’s governor, but he was ambushed and then flown to the United States.
summary: The Sinaloa cartel chief said El Chapo Guzmán’s son invited him to a meeting with Sinaloa’s governor, but he was ambushed and then flown to the United States.

title: Amid Venezuela tumult, U.S. wants Latin American countries to lead in finding a solution
content: The Biden administration has preferred to let leaders of Colombia, Brazil and Mexico take the lead pressuring the Maduro government, but a more active U.S. role may be inevitable.
summary: The Biden administration has preferred to let leaders of Colombia, Brazil and Mexico take the lead pressuring the Maduro government, but a more active U.S. role may be inevitable.
